2.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dThrows a clot of acid that inflicts !e1 damage.
2.name: Acid_Bolt
2.title: Acid Bolt

4.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 damage every 2 seconds for 20 seconds.
Does not affect targets under the Decay effect of the same Summoner.
4.name: Putrefy
4.title: Putrefy

6.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 damage to the target.
Generates !e2 drop of blood.
6.name: Vampirism
6.title: Vampirism

7.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dHeals a friendly target for !e1.
*Consumes 1 drop of blood.*
7.name: Blood_Injection
7.title: Blood Injection

8.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSurrounds you with !e1 walls of blood that increase your armor by 8% and prevents spell casting interruption.
Taking damage cancels 1 stack of the Blood Aegis effect.
* Consumes 3 drops of blood.*
8.name: Blood_Aegis
8.title: Blood Aegis

9.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSummons a Hellion under your control that inflicts !e1 to !e2 damage with its melee attacks and has a Hateful Blow ability that inflicts !e3 to !e4 damage and generates 500% additional threat.
Your Wisdom, Intelligence and Perception affect Hellion's Finess, Strength and Expertise, respectively.
9.name: Summon_Hellion
9.title: Summon Hellion

10.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dCauses the target to flee in terror for 6 seconds.
10.name: Fear
10.title: Fear

11.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dDrains !e1% of your maximum health and generates 5 drops of blood.
In addition, when you are out of combat and have less than !e2 drops of blood, 1 drop is generated every 5 seconds.
Upon resurrection up to !e3 drops of blood are generated immediately.
11.name: Dark_Pact
11.title: Dark Pact

12.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSummons a Fiend under your control that has "Acid Bolt" and Acid Splash abilities, which inflict !e1 damage each.
When Fiend's health reaches 25%, it explodes, leaving an acid cloud on the ground for 10 seconds that reduces movement speed by 50% and inflicts !e2 damage every 2 seconds.
12.name: Summon_Fiend
12.title: Summon Fiend

13.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dHeals a friendly target for !e1 every 2 seconds for 16 seconds.
Spreads to all allies within a 10 yard radius of the target.
After the effect fades the targets becomes immune to the effect for 80 seconds.
* Consumes 4 drops of blood.*
13.name: Plague_of_Mending
13.title: Plague of Mending

14.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dHeals a friendly target for !e1 initially and for !e2 every 2 seconds for 16 seconds.
* Consumes 1 drop of blood.*
14.name: Dark_Renewal
14.title: Dark Renewal

15.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInfects the target and all enemies within a 10 yard radius with a virus that explodes after 8 seconds or upon dispelling and inflicts !e1 damage.
Explosion also inflicts damage to up to 3 enemies within a 10 yard radius.
15.name: Volatile_Infection
15.title: Volatile Infection

16.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dHeals a friendly target for !e1 The effect is increased if the target's health is low.
* Consumes 4 drops of blood.*
16.name: Reanimation
16.title: Reanimation

17.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSummons a Lurker under your control with a Blood Meal ability which inflicts 1.
4-2.
4 damage and restores you 2 drops of blood.
Higher ranks of this spell decrease cooldown time of Blood Meal.
17.name: Summon_Lurker
17.title: Summon Lurker

18.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInfecting the target with a fever that lasts 90 seconds.
The infected character has a !e1% chance to transfer 1 drop of blood to the Summoner every 2 seconds.
After the effect fades or when target is healed to full, it will receive !e2 damage.
Summoner can only maintain one Wandering Fever at a time
18.name: Wandering_Fever
18.title: Wandering Fever

19.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dDecreases the effectiveness of your healing spells by 50%.
Spells you cast increase magic damage done by your party members by !e1%Cast this spell again to remove this effect
19.name: Aura_of_Astral_Power_
19.title: Aura of Astral Power

20.body:
!lvl !cost !dResurrects you with !e1% of your total health and mana.
Makes you immune to all damage for 6 seconds after resurrection.
Stuns you for !e2 seconds, making you unable to move or use abilities.
This effect may not happen more than once every !e3 minutes.
20.name: Rise_from_the_Dead
20.title: Rise from the Dead

21.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !d*Heals a friendly target for !e1 Consumes 1 drop of blood.*
21.name: Blood_Shot_
21.title: Blood Shot

22.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 damage to the target.
Generates !e2 drop of blood.
22.name: Life_Tap
22.title: Life Tap

23.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 Poison damage every 2 seconds for 20 seconds.
Decomposition effect replaces the "Putrefy" effect on the same target applied by the same Summoner.
23.name: Decomposition
23.title: Decomposition

24.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSummons a Cadaver under your control that has "Acid Bolt" and Acid Splash abilities, which inflict !e1 damage each.
When Cadaver's health reaches 25%, it explodes, leaving an acid cloud on the ground for 10 seconds that reduces movement speed by 50% and inflicts !e2 damage every 2 seconds.
24.name: Summon_Cadaver
24.title: Summon Cadaver

25.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dDispels the effects of poisons and diseases from the target causing "Putrefy", "Decomposition" effects to instantly deal the remaining damage, Neurotoxic effect to deal the damage and stun the target, and "Wandering Fever" and "Volatile Infection" to dispel dealing damage.
*Consumes 3 Tears of Dragon.*
Using Tears of Dragon of a higher quality reduces the cooldown.
25.name: Immunodeficiency
25.title: Immunodeficiency

26.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dApplies the Dark Vigor effect to your minion granting it with a new ability.
Duration: 20 seconds.
The effect allows your Guard to stun the enemy with every second Hateful Blow for 1.
2 seconds, helps your Lurker to restore 15.
6 health points of group members every 4 seconds, and allows your Cadaver and Fiend to apply the Obscure Essence effect to a target increasing acid damage by 4 during next three attacks.
*Consumes 5 Tears of Dragon.*
Duration of the effect increases if Tears of Dragon of a higher quality are used.
26.name: Dark_Vigor
26.title: Dark Vigor

27.body:
!lvl !cost !dYour successful "Acid Bolt" hits increase Acid damage taken by the target from you, your Fiend and ?adaver by 2% for 10 seconds.
This effect stacks up to !e1 times
27.name: Acid_Poison
27.title: Acid Poison

28.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dAllows you to summon one of your minions instantly.
Lasts 30 seconds.
Regardless of the presence of this effect, increases the effectiveness of all healing done to your minions by !e1%.
28.name: Summoning_Mastery
28.title: Summoning Mastery

29.body: !lvl !cost !dCast time and mana cost of "Acid Bolt" is reduced by !e1%
29.name: Massacre
29.title: Massacre

30.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the critical strike chance of "Acid Bolt", "Volatile Infection", "Corrosive Acid", and abilities of your Fiend and Cadaver by !e1% of your current critical strike chance.
30.name: Burning_Acid
30.title: Burning Acid

31.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dIncreases Acid damage taken by 2.
28 for 60 seconds or for the next 20 physical attacks.
31.name: Corrosive_Acid
31.title: Corrosive Acid

32.body: !lvl !cost !dCauses you to generate !e1 drop of blood and !e2% of your total mana after killing an enemy.
32.name: Blood_Tap
32.title: Blood Tap

33.body: !lvl !cost !dGrants "Acid Bolt" and "Dark Renewal" a !e1% chance to reduce the cast time and mana cost of the next "Vampirism", "Life Tap", "Blood Injection" or "Blood Shot "by 50% for 15 seconds.
33.name: Darkweaver
33.title: Darkweaver

34.body:
!lvl !cost !dReflects damage applies a Catalyst effect to all enemies in an 8 yard radius when you receive a critical strike.
Acid spells cast on a target under the Catalyst effect deal !e1 more damage and have a !e2% chance to knock the target down.
34.name: Last_Service
34.title: Last Service

35.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases the range of "Acid Bolt", "Vampirism", "Blood Tap", "Blood Injection", "Blood Shot "and "Corrosive Acid" by !e1 yards.
In addition, unstable Antidote receives a !e2% chance to remove one negative magic effect from a target.
35.name: Shadowy_Reach
35.title: Shadowy Reach

36.body: !lvl !cost !dInflicts !e1 damage every few seconds while "Wandering Fever" is active.
36.name: Accelerated_Metabolism
36.title: Accelerated Metabolism

37.body:
!lvl !cost !dCauses your Hellion to generate !e1% more threat.
Increases damage of your and Fiend and Cadaver by !e2%.
Reduces the cooldown duration of your Lurker's Blood Meal by !e3%.
37.name: Master_Summoner
37.title: Master Summoner

38.body: !lvl !cost !dReduces the mana cost of "Acid Bolt", "Blood Injection" and "Blood Shot "by !e1%.
38.name: Desecration
38.title: Desecration

40.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the critical strike damage of "Acid Bolt" and abilities of your Fiend and Cadaver by !e1%.
40.name: Concentrated_Acid
40.title: Concentrated Acid

41.body: !lvl !cost !d"Blood Injection" and "Blood Shot "heal the target for additional !e1 after five seconds
41.name: Delayed_Healing
41.title: Delayed Healing

42.body:
!lvl !cost !d"Putrefy", "Decomposition" and "Neurotoxin" damage over time effects increase damage of your next "Volatile Infection", "Vampirism" or "Life Tap" at a !e1% success rate.
Lasts 10 seconds.
42.name: Toxic_Weakness
42.title: Toxic Weakness

43.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the effects of "Putrefy", Decay, "Volatile Infection", "Wandering Fever", "Neurotoxin" and "Plague of Mending" by !e1%.
43.name: Empowered_Infections
43.title: Empowered Infections

44.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases the duration of the Powerful Antibodies effect caused by "Plague of Mending" by !e1%.
44.name: Advanced_Genetics
44.title: Advanced Genetics

45.body:
!lvl !cost !dGrants "Putrefy" and Decay a !e1% chance to reduce the cast time of the next "Acid Bolt", "Vampirism", "Life Tap", Blood Shot, "Blood Injection", or "Dark Renewal" by 20%.
Effect can stack up to 5 times.
45.name: Necropotency
45.title: Necropotency

46.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the duration of the "Putrefy", Decay, "Plague of Mending", and "Dark Renewal" effects by !e1%.
46.name: Virulence
46.title: Virulence

47.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts the target with a plague that disables them and makes them immune to all attacks for 5 seconds per drop of blood.
Spends all drops of blood and requires at least 5 drops of blood.
You can only use this spell on a single target at a time.
47.name: Debilitating_Plague
47.title: Debilitating Plague

49.body: !lvl !cost !dReduces the cooldown duration of "Fear" by !e1% and increases range by !e2%.
49.name: Panic_Monger
49.title: Panic Monger

50.body: !lvl !cost !dGrants "Volatile Infection" a !e1% chance to inflict the "Putrefy" effect, and "Neurotoxin" a !e2% chance inflict the "Putrefy" or Decay effect.
50.name: Withering_Touch
50.title: Withering Touch

51.body: !lvl !cost !dGrants a !e1% chance for enemies to flee in terror for 2 seconds after they attack you from a distance of 10 yards or less.
51.name: Frightful_Presence
51.title: Frightful Presence

52.body: !lvl !cost !dCritical strike chance of "Putrefy", "Decomposition" and "Neurotoxin" is increased by !e1%
52.name: Poisoned_Blood
52.title: Poisoned Blood

53.body: !lvl !cost !dReduces the mana cost of "Putrefy", Decay, "Plague of Mending", "Wandering Fever", "Volatile Infection", and "Neurotoxin" by !e1%.
53.name: Plaguebringer
53.title: Plaguebringer

54.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts 1.
14 damage every 3 seconds.
When the target is affected by 6 stacks of Neurotoxin, the toxin will explode and inflict 11.
5 damage and stun the target for 3 seconds, making them unable to move or use abilities.
54.name: Neurotoxin
54.title: Neurotoxin

55.body: !lvl !cost !dGrants a !e1% chance to restore one drop of blood after one second whenever you cast a spell that spends drops of blood.
55.name: Blood_Circulation
55.title: Blood Circulation

56.body:
!lvl !cost !dWhen Summoner's health drops below !e1!e2, "Blood Aegis" activates or renews automatically.
!e3!e4seconds cooldown.
56.name: Urgent_Protection
56.title: Urgent Protection

57.body: !lvl !cost !dOne ally within a 10 yard radius of the "Volatile Infection" explosion restores !e1 health every 2 seconds for 8 seconds
57.name: Insatiable_Hunger
57.title: Insatiable Hunger

58.body: !lvl !cost !dHeals you for !e1 every 3 seconds for 9 seconds each time you lose 1 stack of the "Blood Aegis" effect.
58.name: Healing_Shield
58.title: Healing Shield

59.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts 27.
3 damage and reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 5 seconds.
* Consumes 6 drops of blood.*
59.name: Howl_of_Death
59.title: Howl of Death

61.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the size of your blood bank by !e1 drops of blood.
61.name: Reservoir_of_Blood
61.title: Reservoir of Blood

62.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases your Stamina by !e1% and your pet's Stamina by !e2%.
62.name: Dark_Gift
62.title: Dark Gift

63.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases the effect of "Vampirism" and "Life Tap" by !e1% when your health is below 50%.
Increases the damage dealt by "Acid Bolt" and "Howl of Death" by !e2% to targets whose health is below 50%.
63.name: Call_of_the_Grave
63.title: Call of the Grave

64.body: !lvl !cost !dReduces the cast time and mana cost of "Vampirism" and "Life Tap" by !e1%.
64.name: Dark_Leech
64.title: Dark Leech

65.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dResurrects a friendly target with 60% health and 60% mana or energy.
65.name: Summon_Soul
65.title: Summon Soul

66.body:
!lvl !cost !dGrants a !e1% chance to restore drops of blood whenever you deal a critical strike with your "Blood Injection" or Blood Shot.
Grants a !e2% chance that your next "Howl of Death" will not start a cooldown whenever you deal a critical strike with your "Vampirism" or "Life Tap".
In addition, reduces the cast time of your summoning spells by !e3%.
66.name: Reanimator
66.title: Reanimator

67.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the critical strike chance of "Vampirism", "Life Tap", "Howl of Death", "Blood Injection", "Blood Shot "and "Reanimation" by !e1% of your current critical strike chance.
67.name: Endless_Blood
67.title: Endless Blood

68.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases healing effectiveness of all your spells by !e1% and decreases cooldown of Imitate Death by !e2%.
68.name: Insidious_Touch
68.title: Insidious Touch

69.body: !lvl !cost !dGrants "Vampirism" and "Life Tap" a !e1% chance to generate an additional drop of blood and increases a chance of "Wandering Fever" effect to generate an additional drop of blood by !e2%.
69.name: Blood_Flow
69.title: Blood Flow

70.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases damage of your "Vampirism" and "Life Tap" by !e1%.
70.name: Endless_Thirst
70.title: Endless Thirst
